name: ChapstersClanStats
0:
”Alexa, ask chapsters clan are we winning”
”Alexa, ask chapsters clan for top 10 players”
”Alexa, ask chapsters clan for full details”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chapsters clan
des:
Provides the status of the current river race in the Chapsters Clan in Clash Royale. This skill is not endorsed by or affiliated with Clash Royale.

You can ask chapsters clan:
... are we winning: Provides our current position and fame points and similar stats to our nearest rivals
... for full details: Provides full details of all clans in our river race
... for top x players: Provides fame/repair points for the top x players in the current river race
... for next chests for player x: Provides details of next chests for player x in the clan
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
